meanings.definition: A meal or party to which each of the guests contributes a dish.
meanings.sent1: Potlucks are gatherings where everyone brings a different dish to share.
meanings.sent2: We had a potluck at work where everyone brought their favorite food to the party.
meanings.sent3: At the potluck, Bob's dish disappeared so quickly, it was like a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: The potluck was a colorful mosaic of flavors and aromas.
meanings.sent5: The potluck spread was a delicious tapestry of homemade treats.

meanings.definition: A meal at which each guest brings food that is then shared by all.
meanings.sent1: Potlucks are a great way to try a variety of dishes without cooking everything yourself.
meanings.sent2: I love attending potlucks because I get to taste different homemade foods.
meanings.sent3: The potluck turned into a friendly competition of who brought the tastiest dish.
meanings.sent4: The potluck table was a melting pot of culinary delights.
meanings.sent5: The potluck feast was a communal celebration of flavors and friendship.
